meanings.definition: A representation of a smiling face using punctuation marks, letters, and numbers, typically used in electronic communication to convey emotion.
meanings.sent1: I sent my friend a message full of smileys to show how happy I was.
meanings.sent2: She always adds smileys to her emails to make them more friendly.
meanings.sent3: The smileys on the screen made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her text was like a canvas of colorful smileys.
meanings.sent5: The smileys danced across the chat window, bringing joy to the conversation.

meanings.definition: A facial expression characterized by turning up the corners of the mouth to show happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: His smileys brightened up the room and made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's smileys were contagious, spreading joy to all around her.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated smileys made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smileys were like sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The genuine smileys on his face showed his true happiness.
